resources.string:
I’m a passionate software developer who loves turning ideas into real-world applications. I have a strong foundation in Java, Data Structures & Algorithms, and Android development, and enjoy building solutions that are both user-friendly and technically solid.
One of my key projects is Intelli Wealth, a full-featured finance manager app built using modern Android practices like MVVM architecture, Room DB, and MPAndroidChart for data visualization. I focus on writing clean, scalable code and continuously improving my skills.
These days, I’m exploring AI-powered applications, GenAI integration, cloud development with OCI, and backend solutions using Firebase. I love experimenting with new technologies and APIs to create smarter, more interactive apps, while always aiming to deliver meaningful experiences for users.

Hi, I’m Aakash Harishchandra Chauhan, a backend-focused Android app developer using Android Studio. I also have experience creating basic front-end interfaces with XML.
Main Skills: Android Studio, Java, XML, Room DB, API integration, SHA-256, GitHub Gist
I am currently in my second year of Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Telecommunication (ExTc).
I have worked on projects that solve real-world problems, including:
Finance Manage – an app that helps young people analyze and manage their money effectively.
FitProof App – an app that verifies data from Google Fit. Through this project, I gained hands-on experience and confidence in API integration, GitHub Gist, and SHA-256 encryption.
I am also exploring the field of Generative AI, having completed courses from Oracle GenAI and AI Agent Studio, and I strive to stay updated with the latest technologies to create innovative and practical solutions.
